AkadoR 1.0.2

    table Server Functions

    mod_table_server.Rd

    A shiny Module for creation of all table

    mod_table_server(
  id,
  data,
  name,
  type_line_check,
  referential_file,
  column_no_wrap = NULL,
  name_function_plot = NULL,
  name_function_text_plot = NULL,
  title_window = NULL
)

    Arguments

    id

    Internal parameters for shiny

    data

    list expected. Reactive list containing results tables for all checks

    name

    character expected. Control identifier in data to be displayed

    type_line_check

    character expected. Reactive value containing the type of line selected by the user

    referential_file

    list expected. Reactive list containing referential tables for all plot

    column_no_wrap

    integer expected. Default values: NULL. Column numbers that should not be subject to automatic line breaks

    name_function_plot

    character expected. Default values: NULL. Name of the function that creates the plot

    name_function_text_plot

    character expected. Default values: NULL. Name of the function that creates the text to be displayed in the plot window

    title_window

    character expected. Default values: NULL. Plot window name

    Value

    The function returns nothing, instantiating the table

    Contents

    Developed by Oceane Bouhineau.
